description: Make a big batch of this meatball chilli and enjoy the leftovers for lunch.
name: Chipotle Meatball Chilli Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 large capsicums, red and green, cored and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large, deep pan on medium high heat and cook the meatballs, stirring often, for 5 minutes until browned all over. Remove from the pan with a slotted spoon and set aside.

Add the onion and capsicums to the pan and cook for 5 minutes. Stir in the garlic and chipotle paste and cook for 2 minutes. Pour over the chopped tomatoes and add the kidney beans. Reduce the heat and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add the meatballs to the sauce, cover and simmer for 15 minutes.
Serve the meatballs with chopped coriander on top and lime wedges on the side.
